rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKC3110} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit forms the capstone of the marketing major and integrates the conceptual knowledge and skills developed in earlier marketing units and sharpens students' abilities to evaluate and implement marketing strategies. Particular emphasis is placed on implementing marketing, from action plans at the functional level through to creating a market oriented organisational culture.
